AboutPage.title: About Moroccan Car Price Predictor
AboutPage.subtitle: Your trusted tool for accurate car price predictions in Morocco

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.description: We provide an advanced machine learning-based solution to help you estimate the market value of cars in Morocco. Our system takes into account various factors to give you the most accurate price prediction possible.

features.1: Accurate price predictions based on comprehensive data analysis
features.2: Consideration of multiple factors including brand, model, year, and condition
features.3: User-friendly interface for easy price estimation

1.title: Enter Car Details
1.description: Fill in your car's specifications including brand, model, year, and condition

2.title: Add Features
2.description: Select the equipment and features your car has

3.title: Get Prediction
3.description: Receive an accurate price estimate based on our advanced algorithm

PredictPage.title: Car Price Prediction
PredictPage.priceNote: This is an estimated price based on the provided specifications. The actual price may vary depending on market conditions and other factors.
